(32245, 35331).label: platform

(32245, 35331).label: weather event

(34859, 38084).name: climate indices

(34859, 38084).name: vulnerability
(34859, 38084).label: variable

(34859, 38084).name: Earth System Models

(34859, 38084).name: grid cells

(37645, 40501).name: ESMs
